english.segment1: Just hear me out. This was all my fault. Now you've brought me death, and it's everything I wanted. It's the wrong side of fear that kept me out. It's the wrong inside that fills my mouth;. has left me without in this darkness. I've given my ground.
english.segment2: But know this night will be my.. But know this night will be my.. Will be my..
english.segment3: Esta noche, sera mia. Esta noche, sera mia. Esta noche, sera mia. Esta noche, sera mia.
